prerequisiteCourse: Acquaintance with Pinyin/or/ㄅㄆㄇㄈ phonetic system before taking Mandarin II.
objective:
The emphasis in this class is to develop listening, speaking, reading and writing skills using Pinyin phonetic system and traditional Chinese characters.
The objectives cover aspects of Chinese phonology, basic sentence patterns, and some simple conversations on topics, which also introduce the social and cultural background of the language.
In our basic mandarin lessons you will learn:
1.	Reading and speaking
2.	Chinese characters recognition and memorizing characters
3.	Mandarin vocabulary, phrases, and simple conversation
4.	Writing Chinese characters- basic stroke order
5.	Mandarin phonetic- Pinyin
6.	Understand four tones
prerequisiteAbility: Acquaintance with Pinyin/or/ㄅㄆㄇㄈ phonetic system before taking Mandarin II.
condition: Please learn  Pinyin/or/ㄅㄆㄇㄈ phonetic system before taking this course. A Placement Test will be held at the first meeting of the class!
grading:
a. Class attendance and participation (10%) 
b. Completion of homework/ a on time and quizzes (20%) 
c. A role-play/ video project (20%)
d. Midterm exam (25%)
e. Final exam (written or / and oral ) (25%)
method:
*Please make sure students be acquainted with Pinyin/or/ㄅㄆㄇㄈ phonetic system before taking Mandarin II. 
Then, teaching approach will be varied depending on the needs of the learners.
For the first lesson, teacher-student communication should be made in order for me to understand the level of the students as well as their expectations, so that the suitable teaching method and materials can be appropriately provided.
 For team work, we might use a situation and scenario approach aimed to encourage the learners towards enjoying in their learning process.
remark:
*Acquaintance to Han-Yu Pinyin system is required.
*Each student will have to finish a video project at the end of semester, in addition to meeting all other grading criteria.
*Please come to the class with copy-righted text materials.
